headline: GOLD ROYALTY TO ACQUIRE PRODUCING PEDRA BRANCA GOLD AND COPPER ROYALTY
summary: Gold Royalty Corp. ("Gold Royalty" or the "Company") (NYSE American: GROY) is pleased to announce that it has entered into an agreement to acquire an existing royalty (the "Royalty") on the Pedra Branca mine, from BlackRock World Mining Trust plc ("BlackRock") for $70 million in cash (the "Transaction"). Pedra Branca is an operating copper and gold mine located in Brazil and currently owned and operated by a subsidiary of BHP Group Limited ("BHP"). In August 2025, BHP announced the sale of the P

content.summary: Gold Royalty Corp. ("Gold Royalty" or the "Company") (NYSE American: GROY) is pleased to announce that it has entered into an agreement to acquire an existing royalty (the "Royalty") on the Pedra Branca mine, from BlackRock World Mining Trust plc ("BlackRock") for $70 million in cash (the "Transaction").
